title: REPLICATION_GROUPS View (Information Schema): New Column in View | Snowflake Documentation
paragraphs: This behavior change is in the 2023_02 bundle.
For the current status of the bundle, refer to Bundle History.
The Information Schema REPLICATION_GROUPS view now includes a REGION_GROUP column:
Region group where the account that stores the replication or failover group is located.

To maintain consistency with the Information Schema REPLICATION_DATABASES view,
this column has been added as the first (leftmost) column of the view.
